title: Braised Jacob’s Ladder, kohlrabi, mustard cream and crisp shallots
description: Short ribs of beef are cooked low and slow in a sweet barbecue sauce for melt-in-your-mouth tender meat.
ingredients: 2 Jacob’s Ladder short ribs, cut into individual ribs
1 large banana shallot, peel and finely slice
1 small kohlrabi, peeled and thinly sliced
